name: Project "Hoppity" (Unfinished Prototype)
description:
An unfinished project I've been working for a bit. I didn't manage to get any time to work on it any more lately, so I'm releasing what I have made already so the project isn't just lost forever.

Controls:

WASDMove / Aim TongueSCrouch / Break (slow down)JJumpKUse Tongue (hold to run)RReset Level

This only has a very short test level with a few enemies sprinkled around. Your little frog guy is pretty slow, but he can push himself away from walls with his tongue, which will give him a lot of speed and momentum to make some huge jumps.

As far as I'm aware of there isn't any game-breaking bug in this, and it should be playable to the end.
